XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data: <Routes> <Route Url="/messages" Method="GET" Call="GetMessages"/> <Route Url="/messages" Method="PUT" Call="PutMessage"/> </Routes>

Method.name: GetMessages
Method.Implementation:
set %response.ContentType = "application/json"
set domain = %request.Data("domain", 1) set language = %request.Data("language", 1) quit ##class(CLM.Utils).GetMessageList(domain, language)

Method.name: PutMessage
Method.Implementation: set domain = %request.Data("domain", 1) set language = %request.Data("langauge", 1) set id = %request.Data("id", 1) set text = %request.Data("text", 1) quit ##class(CLM.Utils).PutMessage(domain, language, id, text)

Method.name: GetGlobalStructure
GetMessageList
